website_summaries.verdict: Quality hairdressing scissors by a popular brand that present with notable workmanship.
pros: Durable construction by a popular name in hairdressing tools
Extremely sharp blades deliver precision cuts
Scissors feel good in the hand and are comfortable for most users to manoeuvre
Available in several length options for different hair cutting needs
cons: Finger holes are fairly small, which may leave hairdressers with large hands feeling a bit miffed

customer_reviews.title: The finger holes are very small
customer_reviews.text: I have big hands, fair enough, but these hole are really small. I am not familiar with barber scissors, but I cannot use these properly, my thumb is not getting in far enough.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Precise and comfortable cutting action...
customer_reviews.text: I had bought one of those cutting kits and the quality was meh. When you pick these up you will immediately feel the difference. Great balance and action. You can feel the microserated cutting edge as you open and close the scissors. Very sharp surgical precision. Makes family hair cuts, a bit more managable. Im 6'3 and once i pulled the plastic finger inserts out of the 15.24cm shears, my fingers fit no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Hubic

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Very good used them for years alway been my favourite scissors for work! Very tight had to loosen them a few times when I first got them but after that they where great
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by hair stylists
customer_reviews.text: Best scissors on the market. I asked a hair stylist what scissors they use/recommend and they all said Jaguar. I bought one and would never look back. Just never drop it! If it drops, it will not align is well. The stroke is smooth and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: F. Steyn

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to use and nice and sharp. Have used my old Jaquars regularly for 20 years without sharpening so hope these will be as good.
customer_reviews.author: Mosie

customer_reviews.title: Invaluable for lockdown
customer_reviews.text: Very sharp - not something you'd want a child to handle - slices through hair cleanly. This is the entry-level pair of scissors in this range but for casual trimming it's excellent and may meet the needs of most people. Reasonably comfortable to hold, inserts can be removes if one has larger fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Burdett-Jones

customer_reviews.title: Excellent professional hairdressing scissors.
customer_reviews.text: Jaguar are the only professional hairdressing scissors I use & I recommend highly. I have small fingers and these fit my fingers perfectly when cutting hair, very comfortable to use and very sharp. Excellent! Value for money! Arrived quickly! 😁
customer_reviews.author: Cinderella

customer_reviews.title: Jaguar is an excellent brand
customer_reviews.text: I have had Jaguar scissors for years now and they are always great to use. Initally yjey wouldn't cut at the tip so my husband had to adjust them slightly but all ok now.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I have had these since February, But due to lock down I have not used them that much. Unfortunately I used them the other day and they are not very sharp. I had to keep re cutting with them. 🙄
customer_reviews.author: penny phillips

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had a few pairs of these over the years and find them sharp and a nice size
customer_reviews.author: Jo Milne

customer_reviews.title: Just the job
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to use, great price. I’m not a professional, but these were just what I was looking for to trim my daughter’s hair during lockdown. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: FeeGee

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great little pair of scirrors for lock-down haircuts, although these are harder than they seem :-)
customer_reviews.author: Iraj K Ali

customer_reviews.title: Great scissors!
customer_reviews.text: Great scissors for a novice hair dresser! They are very sharp and comfortable to hold, great price to do simple hair cuts....... Would recommend, only slight downside is they don't come with a case....
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Scissors
customer_reviews.text: It cuts hair - therefore doe's what it should do GRC
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable use
customer_reviews.text: Using the product for my hairdressing job and like them,
customer_reviews.author: gail keen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality scissors
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good quality pair of scissors, and you certainly get what you pay for. I could tell straight away that these cut neater then my other pair of cheap scissors.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good to handle nice balance very sharp very professional and good delivery
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: It was second hand item
customer_reviews.text: It was second hand cissor and I've found small cutted hair in between blades which really made me suprized as I've paid for brand new cissor.
customer_reviews.author: Maryam samaei

customer_reviews.title: Good scissors worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Arrived earlier than expected. Lightweight and sharp. Only used to but my fringe but did the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Jaguar scissors for hairdressers
customer_reviews.text: Jaguar scissors never disappoint and these are no exception. Obviously small blades don't suit all hairdressers but I love them. They are well balanced and comfortable to hold.
customer_reviews.author: hairdresser

customer_reviews.title: ... someone who has never used proper hair scissors - super to use
customer_reviews.text: These were a revelation to someone who has never used proper hair scissors - super to use!
customer_reviews.author: Cagos

customer_reviews.title: How can return items
customer_reviews.text: Hi I tried to Return this item but The Return code doesn’t work please send me a new cood to return that item
customer_reviews.author: REKAWAT

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I have returned this item a week ago and I haven't received any money back . The quality is really poor
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great quick service!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my new scissors,they have got a nice feel to them, I have been hairdressing for 27 years so would like to think I know what I am talking about.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Mac

customer_reviews.title: Description and delivery excellent
customer_reviews.text: Always use this make of scissors very pleased with price and delivery
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful
customer_reviews.text: These are very sharp sissors so be very careful if cutting near skin. They are comfortable to hold and use.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth C.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Scissors!
customer_reviews.text: These scissors cut like butter! They are so smooth, no snagging of the hair. They are the perfect basic hair scissor to have in your collection and have a great weight too.
customer_reviews.author: Brionne Beck

customer_reviews.title: the young lady is very happy with her scissor she can keep to a high ...
customer_reviews.text: the young lady is very happy with her scissor she can keep to a high standard of work with a good cut thanks peter
customer_reviews.author: Peter K.

customer_reviews.title: A cut above!
customer_reviews.text: My wife has been using these scissors for years and each pair she buys is as good as the last! She has been a hairdresser for 28 years now and uses nothing else!
customer_reviews.author: Huck Finn

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant scissors
customer_reviews.text: Being a professional hairdresser my previous scissors had broken and I needed a cheap replacement quickly jaguar have always been a good make of scissors I have been using these for a couple of weeks now on my clients and they are fantastic cut through all types of hair with ease would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: jade

customer_reviews.title: Good pair of scissors for the price, precision and sharpness could be better
customer_reviews.text: Good pair of scissors for the beginner / casual at home hair cutting. They are comfortable to use and get the job done. Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sweenuk

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for Money
customer_reviews.text: I bought these scissors for my wife who is a professional hairdresser of some 40 years. She has used Jaguar Pre-Style Ergo scissors for a number of years so was aware of what to expect. From her point of view, they are very comfortable and very sharp and ideal for the purpose that they were bought for. On the negative side, she felt that the packaging felt a little cheap and flimsy when compared to previous pairs; however this was more than compensated for the very reasonable price. I did find the Invoice supplied from the German supplier a little confusing as it gave a different price to that on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: David Matthews

customer_reviews.title: Sharp scissors
customer_reviews.text: Good quality hairdressing scissors. As other reviewers have suggested - slightly small on the finger loops. I have reasonably large hands for a female, but with a little wriggling they fit fine for cutting hair. I'm not a hairdresser but find that they are very sharp, and do the job perfectly at home.
customer_reviews.author: YvonneP

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Great scissors for the money. Bought them for my daughter. extremely sharp. You won't go far wrong with jaguar scissors
customer_reviews.author: Donie Ducey

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality scissors
customer_reviews.text: I googled best hairdressing scissors and these came up on every hit. Lovely and compact. So sharp they sliced into my finger so be careful. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Cap413

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good scissors very sharp. I've cut my own hair and now I look stupid
customer_reviews.author: Steve W

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: They looked like rubbish but to be fair they are very good.
customer_reviews.author: JES

customer_reviews.title: Good but not for me
customer_reviews.text: Scissors arrived quickly and are as described. I just don’t like the feel of them. It’s a personal preference not the scissors themselves.
customer_reviews.author: Leanne derbyshire

customer_reviews.title: Lockdown sissors
customer_reviews.text: Lockdown sissors fur a friend, she is made up with them.
customer_reviews.author: Wonder pen

customer_reviews.title: Good size scissors
customer_reviews.text: Love these scissors I always buy Jaguar scissors. Really comfortable to use and light.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Scissors
customer_reviews.text: Have been hairdressing for 30+ years and, for the price, these have got to be the best scissors I have owned
customer_reviews.author: martin

customer_reviews.title: Good scissors
customer_reviews.text: Really good scissors. Very sharp. I bought them to cut my baby's hair and was very pleased using them.
customer_reviews.author: Happy to use amazon

customer_reviews.title: - Comfortable to hold - feels sturdy and expensive - the ...
customer_reviews.text: Pros - Very very sharp, I used it to cut my whole hair, and no one could believe I did it myself! - Comfortable to hold - feels sturdy and expensive - the size is just perfect for hair cutting (fringe or whole-head)... Cons? None I cut myself 3 times because of how sharp it is, although I'm very delicate and careful with it.... I couldn't recommend it more...
customer_reviews.author: Emely

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product
customer_reviews.text: I've had these scissors for a while now and I wish I had never bought them They are cheap they look cheap and they don't cut well
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: not good
customer_reviews.text: Would not recommend these for hairdressers,used once and not impressed at all,packaging was awful,and dropped through the door in just an envelope!
customer_reviews.author: miss warks

customer_reviews.title: only useful for mannequins
customer_reviews.text: Rubbish they grind more than cut, slicing action is not possible, only useful for mannequins
customer_reviews.author: Peter

product_meta.title: Jaguar Scissor - Pre-Style Ergo 82260 6"
product_meta.description: re style Professional scissors made of stainless steel. Models in highly polished look or satin finish. A cutting edge micro serration. Model series Pre Style Slice with hollow grinding and honing of both blades for easy slicing. Pre Style Ergo Classic design for a traditional feeling during cutting. Satin finish.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars116 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
